values: 螺钉；螺丝钉；螺旋运动；螺旋形物体；囚犯看守；监狱看守；性交；（机械中的）旋转部件；（船只的）螺旋桨；（酒瓶的）开瓶器
拧紧；旋紧；用螺钉固定；旋上；拧开；旋开；使（球）旋转；调整（镜头、设备等）；欺骗；诈骗；与…性交

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 扭曲的；螺旋形的；古怪的；疯颠的
拧紧（screw的ing形式）；用螺钉固定

word_group.brief_definition: 举止略有异常, 行为稍嫌古怪
乱搞性关系；闲逛；混日子

bilingual.source: He used force to screw up the screw.
The screw thread on this screw is damaged.
What is the pitch of this screw?
bilingual.target: 这个螺丝的螺距是多少？

bilingual.source: The screw fell out of the hinge.
bilingual.target: 螺丝从铰链上掉了出来。

bilingual.source: The size of this screw is not right.
Tighten the screw to secure the bracket.
Can you help me tighten this screw?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我拧紧这个螺丝吗？

bilingual.source: She held the tiny screw with tweezers.
bilingual.target: 她用镊子夹住了小螺丝。
请逆时针旋转这个螺丝。

bilingual.source: You need to tighten the screw clockwise.
bilingual.target: 你需要顺时针拧紧螺丝。

list.abstract: ScRew：乐队新生力日本视觉系乐队。由PSC旗下五名风格不同的成员组成。其音乐极具爆发力。长期出道以来多受好评。

yingyinNormal.en: Aw, screw it. I'm in. Me, too. And me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不管了，我去。我也去。还有我。

yingyinNormal.en: Screw you. My pain is real. You know what? Forget the past.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去你们的。哥的苦你们不懂。其实呢？忘了那些往事吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Screw you, Dave. Hey, you want to see something cool? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 骗你的，戴夫，想不想看个吊炸天的。

yingyinNormal.en: That ball of fluff got a screw loose. Let's get out of here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这绒毛球疯了，我们撤。

yingyinNormal.en: Screw princess Panchali. Hey, you can't talk to me like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去他妈潘查理公主。不许你这么说我。

yingyinNormal.en: If you think I'm gonna forgive you... I don't. No, you were right. I did just want to say, "Screw you," and storm out of here. Well, go ahead. Screw you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你以为我会原谅你… 我没有。你说得对，我就是想说“去你妈的”，然后甩门而去。

yingyinNormal.en: Screw his balcony. I'll give you $120 and we'll put it in my garage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去你的阳台，我给你120美元，我要放到我的车库。

yingyinNormal.en: The plural of coccyx is coccyges. Screw you. Give me back my lima beans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尾椎骨的英文复数是“coccyges”。去你丫的，还哥青豆。

yingyinNormal.en: Screw you, Mike. You're a coward and a bastard, and I hope you rot in hell!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这个混蛋，麦克，你这个胆怯的杂种，我希望你烂死在地狱里。

yingyinNormal.en: What can I do? Look, I don't want to do anything to screw it up with Ursula.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能怎么办？我不想让乌苏拉不开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I thought there was a chance that... What, that I'd screw everything up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得有可能...有可能我会搞砸一切吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? Screw you, Sheldon. You are the most annoying person I have ever met.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，滚你丫的，你是我这辈子见过最烦的人了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what, screw them. Our night is going to be way more special than theirs. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 管他们的呢，我们的夜晚会比他们的难忘许多。对。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you sure? We may have something at Louis Vuitton. Screw charity work. What do you got?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你肯定？我想我们现在需要人手。慈善工作，你们有什么?

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that depends. On what? Is that friend Wolowitz? Yeah. Screw him. You're fine. Are you sure?
yingyinNormal.zh: 看情况了。什么情况？那朋友是沃罗威茨吗？没错。去他的，你是好人。你确定吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, sweetie, if you're gonna screw things up, it's gonna be while you're here, not while you're away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，一般会破坏感情都是你在的时候，你不在时万事大吉。

yingyinNormal.en: So, how does it open? Screw the top. Two weeks ago? Three. I'm that predictable? No. I'm just a cock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，怎么打开？把手柄拧开。两周前放的吗？三周前。我有这么好猜吗？没有。我就是个混球。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no upside. If you do well, no one cares. And if you screw up, you're an idiot on YouTube forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这事就没好处，你开了好球，没人会在意，如果你搞砸了，你的蠢态将在视频网站上千古流传。

yingyinNormal.en: I like to think of those things you're holding as my truth balls. Screw this. Let's get to the meatballs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我更愿意把你们手里握着的东西想成是我的实话球[蛋蛋] 。滚他丫的，咱们去吃肉丸吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I figure this is probably my last shot with Penny and I don't want to screw it up. Nobody wants that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么说呢，我觉得这可能是我和佩妮最后的机会了，我不想搞砸了。谁都不想搞砸。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They can <highlight>screw</highlight> us up and set us back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以搞砸我们（的计划），让我们倒退。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Mass had difficulty in fixing the <highlight>screws</highlight> when repairing the instrument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在修理仪器时，马斯在固定螺丝方面有困难。

examination_example.sentence: Before we could replace the power supply, we would have to remove from the telescope a handrail fixed with four <highlight>screws</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们更换电源之前，我们必须从望远镜上取下一个用四个螺丝固定的扶手。
